Class Appliance

java.lang.Object
Appliance
public class Appliance
extends java.lang.Object

    this method is ConStructor that will take 3 argument and also get serial number for each instance of this class i.e each appliance will get a different serial number

    • findAppliancesby

      public static void findAppliancesby​(java.lang.String brandName, Appliance[] inventory)
      This method prints detail of all the appliance in the inventory with same brand given by the user.
      Parameters:
      brandName - the brand which you want to search in the inventory
      inventory - this second parameter of this method is an array of type Appliance, which will searched to find appliance with same brand.

    • findCheaperThan

      public static void findCheaperThan​(double price, Appliance[] array)
      The findercheaperthan display all the appliances in the inventory with price less than the given price by the user.
      Parameters:
      price - This is the first parameter of the method, which sets limit for the price of the Appliance.
      array - Inventory(type Appliance) you want to search to find the appliance cheaper than parameter price.

    • emptyspace

      public static int emptyspace​(Appliance[] array)
      emptyspace returns the available space in the array.
      Parameters:
      array - the array which is searched to find the space.
      Returns:
      number empty(or null) spaces in the array.

    • searialChecker

      public static boolean searialChecker​(java.lang.Long serialnumber, Appliance[] array)
      The serialchecker method looks for a given serial number in a given inventory and return true or false depending upon the condition.
      Parameters:
      serialnumber - serial number you want to search
      array - inventory searched to find the appliance with with same serial number
      Returns:
      the return a boolean value which implies that given serial number exist in the given inventory

    • getIndex

      public static int getIndex​(java.lang.Long serialnumber, Appliance[] array)
      This method return the index value of the item from the inventory array if item's serial number matches with the given serial number
      Parameters:
      serialnumber - serial number that you want to look for in the inventory
      array - Appliance type inventory which is searched to find the item with the same serial number
      Returns:
      index of the appliance with the matched serial number

    • isvalid

      public static boolean isvalid​(java.lang.String pass)
      isvalid checks if the user input matches with stored password.
      Parameters:
      pass - the final or immutable password to access certain functions of the program
      Returns:
      boolean value

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method of the Appliance class shows user certain option to choose from to manipulate and access appliance class methods and attributes. The user is asked for the password to update inventory or to store new item in the inventory. if the user enter wrong password 12 times the program will terminate.
      Parameters:
      args -
